casebody.data:
Theodore H. FRANK, et al., petitioners,
v.
Paloma GAOS, Individually and on Behalf of All Others Similarity Situated, et al. No. 17-961. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 1, 2018.

Joint motion of respondents for divided argument granted. Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted. Motion of Former Professor Roy A. Katriel for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument denied.
